name: Yangyang Mobile

description:
Yangyang Mobile is a small, independent company that specializes in developing software applications and games for both mobile and desktop. Before offically being founded in July 2015, our members have been developing award-winning games since 2011.Â 

If you're looking for a team that's fast, resourceful, creative and reliable above all, then you've come to the right place. Chat with us about your ideas at hello@yangyangmobile.com.
